title: Poppov
author: Poppov
content: 1xbit scammed my money1xbit locked up my account ( 540329753 ) suddenly and disable me from logging back in.I have deposited over 800 USDT to this tron address TKcX6iU5zEiGF7GgZJfVZaWFA5L1Jfzn4W, which belongs to 1xbit.They have moved the funds away 2 hours after my account was locked, not replying any emails from me.After 24 hours, they finally email to me that they have stopped collaboration with me and close my account, without giving a legit reason at all.I've sent over 10 emails to them and none has been replied at all. Here's the only email they have sent to me:"We want to inform you, that our company decided to stop any collaboration with you (closing your account).The decision was made after a careful investigation of the situation by our security service. The decision is based on a violation of the Terms and Conditions."Their entire support team tells me that I have been provided "all informations I need to know", which is complete bs and ignorant.Almost all my money are gone now, but I will raise public attention towards this case so that no one gets scammed anymore.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: I laugh when I see 1xbit accusations, and I apologize if I offended you. It's because, despite numerous accusations against them on the internet, you still decide to deposit there. You may now claim that you did not conduct any research and have not seen any accusations. So, how do you think other people will notice your thread? You stated that you brought this thread to the public's attention. But you had no idea there were more public attention threads that you had missed and been deceived by. BTW, please do your own research before depositing money anywhere. If you have already been deceived, there is no cure.
